channel.title: How To Make A Pking Limit Thinggyy!?
channel.description: I was wondering how can i make it so when you pk you cant get pk points for players you have killed more then once in a row, atm my server is when you kill some1 u get pk points and when u kill the same person over and over again you still get pkp and i dont want that because there is a pkp shop to get items that are good. Please Help!
